text: An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the 2019 Newest Dell 15.6" FHD IPS High-Performance Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-8300H Quad-Core | 8GB+1TB HDD | GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Had several issues with the 2019 Newest Dell 15.6" FHD IPS High-Performance Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-8300H Quad-Core | 8GB+1TB HDD | GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 since day one. overheats and the port selection feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

The 2019 Newest Dell 15.6" FHD IPS High-Performance Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-8300H Quad-Core | 8GB+1TB HDD | GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Had several issues with the 2019 Newest Dell 15.6" FHD IPS High-Performance Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-8300H Quad-Core | 8GB+1TB HDD | GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 since day one. overheats and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the 2019 Newest Dell 15.6" FHD IPS High-Performance Gaming Laptop | Intel Core i5-8300H Quad-Core | 8GB+1TB HDD | GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
